typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	CorpusContainer as string,
	CorpusFolder as string,
	RootContainer as string,
	RootFolder as string,
	Entity as string,
	ManifestEntityPath as string,
	ManifestName as string
}
source(output(
		JOURNALBATCHNUMBER as short,
		LINENUMBER as short,
		ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE as string,
		ACCOUNTTYPE as string,
		CASHDISCOUNT as string,
		CASHDISCOUNTAMOUNT as string,
		CASHDISCOUNTDATE as string,
		CREDITAMOUNT as double,
		CURRENCYCODE as string,
		DEBITAMOUNT as double,
		DEFAULTDIMENSIONDISPLAYVALUE as string,
		DESCRIPTION as string,
		DOCUMENT as string,
		DUEDATE as string,
		EXCHANGERATE as double,
		EXCHANGERATESECONDARY as double,
		INVOICE as string,
		ISPOSTED as boolean,
		ITEMSALESTAXGROUP as string,
		JOURNALNAME as string,
		OFFSETACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE as string,
		OFFSETACCOUNTTYPE as string,
		OFFSETDEFAULTDIMENSIONDISPLAYVALUE as string,
		OFFSETTEXT as string,
		PAYMENTID as string,
		PAYMENTMETHOD as string,
		PAYMENTREFERENCE as string,
		POSTINGLAYER as string,
		POSTINGPROFILE as string,
		QUANTITY as double,
		SALESTAXCODE as string,
		SALESTAXGROUP as string,
		TAXEXEMPTNUMBER as string,
		TEXT as string,
		TRANSDATE as date,
		VOUCHER as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		JournalName as string,
		JournalBatchNumber as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		AccountName as string,
		AccountType as string,
		CreditAmount as string,
		DebitAmount as string,
		Currency as string,
		ExchangeRate as string,
		Description as string,
		Invoice as string,
		IsPosted as string,
		PostedDate as string,
		PostingLayer as string,
		OffsetAccountName as string,
		OffsetAccountType as string,
		PaymentMethod as string,
		PaymentDate as string
	),
	entity: ($Entity),
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	folderPath: ($RootFolder),
	fileSystem: ($RootContainer),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusPath: ($CorpusFolder),
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: ($CorpusContainer),
	truncate: false,
	umask: 0022,
	mapColumn(
		JournalName = JOURNALNAME,
		JournalBatchNumber = JOURNALBATCHNUMBER,
		LineNumber = LINENUMBER,
		AccountName = ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE,
		AccountType = ACCOUNTTYPE,
		CreditAmount = CREDITAMOUNT,
		DebitAmount = DEBITAMOUNT,
		Currency = CURRENCYCODE,
		ExchangeRate = EXCHANGERATE,
		Description = DESCRIPTION,
		Invoice = INVOICE,
		IsPosted = ISPOSTED,
		PostedDate = DUEDATE,
		PostingLayer = POSTINGLAYER,
		OffsetAccountName = OFFSETACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE,
		OffsetAccountType = OFFSETACCOUNTTYPE,
		PaymentMethod = PAYMENTMETHOD,
		PaymentDate = TRANSDATE
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
